name: Classic Automation
overview:
Established in the year 2012, at Pune (Maharashtra, India), we, “Classic Automation”, have gained recognition as the leading manufacturer and supplier of a premium quality range of Conveyor Rollers, Industrial Conveyors, Pick & Place Automation Systems, Industrial Trolleys & Metal Pallets.

Our Team: We are backed by a dexterous team of professionals who help in manufacturing and exporting superior quality range of products. Our professionals help us in manufacturing premium quality range of products as per the exact requirements of our clients.

Our Quality Assurance: As a quality-driven enterprise, we ensure that the entire product range is stringently tested for consistent level of quality. For this purpose, we have established an advanced quality-control unit, wherein our experienced quality controllers monitor all the stages of the manufacturing process.

Client Satisfaction: Our main motto is to provide our clients optimum satisfaction, so we try hard to satisfy them optimally. We follow advanced methods to give our clients the best products, which fulfill exact demands of clients.

Research and Development: Owing to our stable research and development unit, we have been able to redefine quality, both in terms of technology and innovation. We have a fully active Research & Development unit that is equipped with advanced equipment.
